backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining access-controlled user profiles, inventories, shipments, movement logs, healthcare facilities, and CRM relations with CRUD and query methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping frontend files to implemented UI/UX improvements with associated components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and UI roles of various frontend components, hooks, pages, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining OKLCH theme tokens, light/dark mode variables, and base styling for borders and backgrounds.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point that loads the React application via main.tsx and provides the root mounting element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component managing authentication state, profile setup flow, theming, and high-level layout with header, footer, and dashboard.
frontend/src/components/CRMTab.tsx: CRM management tab enabling creation, editing, deletion, and note‑taking for medical service relationships with responsive UI dialogs and search.
frontend/src/components/DashboardOvervie: Dashboard overview displaying summary metrics, low‑stock alerts, and pending shipments using responsive cards and loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Displays a centered empty-state UI with an icon, title, optional description, and optional action button.
frontend/src/components/FacilityTab.tsx: Fetches and lists healthcare facilities, with a dialog to add new facilities and loading/empty states.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with a copyright notice and link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Shows the app header with branding, theme toggle, and authenticated user menu including logout.
frontend/src/components/InventoryTab.tsx: Manages inventory items with search, add-item dialog, quantity update dialog, and stock status badges.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Presents a login landing page with branding, login button, and feature highlight cards.
frontend/src/components/MovementTab.tsx: Displays movement logs and provides a form to record equipment movements between locations.
frontend/src/components/PageHeader.tsx: Renders a page section header with a title, optional description, and optional action element.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal form that collects and submits the user's name and contact number using a saveProfile mutation.
frontend/src/components/ReportTab.tsx: UI for generating summary and hospital-specific reports, handling date input, API calls, and displaying results.
frontend/src/components/ShipmentTab.tsx: Tab for listing, creating, and updating shipments, including destination selection, equipment selection, and status updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that initializes and manages the backend actor based on the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, identity persistence, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for profiles, inventory, shipments, reports, and admin checks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variable theme tokens for light and dark modes, including colors, radius, and typography utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, sets up React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the dashboard page with tab-based navigation and renders content components for each tab using scrollable, responsive UI elements.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with extended color tokens mapped to CSS variables, custom radius, shadows, container settings, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, requirements, existing features, and pending UI template enhancement request metadata.
